title: CBC Life
text:
Whether you simply can't choose just one Halloween muse this year, or you've got multiple parties lined up and don't want to recycle the same costume, onlinekyne is here with a solution to your spooky season dilemma. In this wig styling tutorial, he shows how to achieve three totally different looks — a classic kitty cat, Edward Scissorhands and Bride of Frankenstein — using the same basic black wig. And if you've never worked with wigs before, don't worry! Kyne's detailed instructions make these styles a breeze to master even for total novices. Check out the video below for the full demo.

With onlinekyne’s styling tips, and a whole lot of teasing, you can switch up your look without spending a fortune. 7:38
description: With onlinekyne’s styling tips, and a whole lot of teasing, you can switch up your look without spending a fortune.
